description: I'm Samuel Bernardes, a Computer Engineering student at CEFET-MG and graduated as an Informatics Technician from IFMG. I have practical experience in web and mobile development, using React, React Native and TypeScript, in addition to familiarity with backend in C# and Node.js. I'm interested in expanding my work on academic and professional projects involving technological innovation, research and high-quality software development.
